description:
212 VIP Black EDP - The Ultimate Expression of Masculine Luxury

Experience the captivating allure of Carolina Herrera 212 VIP Black, a fragrance that redefines elegance for the modern gentleman. This exclusive men's perfume embodies sophistication with its intoxicating blend of notes that command attention in any room. âœ¨

Product Information

Feature Details
Size 100ml
Gender Men
Product Type Eau de Parfum
Concentration Eau de Parfum (EDP)
Brand Carolina Herrera

The Olfactory Journey of 212 VIP Black

Note Type Notes
Top Notes Absinthe, Fennel, Black Pepper
Heart Notes Lavender, Leather, Vodka
Base Notes Musk, Amber, Vanilla

Key Features of 212 VIP Black EDP

  • ðŸ”¥ Bold and intense composition perfect for evening wear
  • ðŸ’Ž Distinctive absinthe opening that creates an unforgettable entrance
  • âœ¨ Unique blend of lavender and leather for a sophisticated masculine appeal
  • ðŸŒ¿ Long-lasting performance with 8+ hours of projection
  • ðŸ’« Sleek, modern bottle design that epitomizes luxury

Launched in 2017, 212 VIP Black represents Carolina Herrera's vision of the ultimate VIP nightlife experience. This bestselling fragrance was created by perfumers Emilie Coppermann and Carlos Benaim, who crafted a scent that embodies the exclusive nightclub scene of New York City. The innovative addition of vodka notes creates a distinctive luxury fragrance signature that has made it a staple in sophisticated men's collections worldwide.

The distinctive black bottle with its metallic cap pays homage to the contemporary elegance that the Carolina Herrera brand is known for. Perfect for the confident man who embraces his VIP status and isn't afraid to stand out in a crowd.

Frequently Asked Question

How does 212 VIP Black differ from the original 212 VIP Men?

While the original 212 VIP focuses on fresh, vibrant notes with lime and passion fruit, 212 VIP Black takes a more intense approach with absinthe, leather, and warm amber. The Black edition is notably more sophisticated and evening-oriented, with deeper projection and a more mysterious character that makes it ideal for night events and formal occasions. The addition of unique vodka accords gives it an unmistakable signature that sets it apart from other luxury men's fragrances.
short_description: Discover 212 VIP Black EDP, Carolina Herrera's bold masculine masterpiece. This intoxicating blend of absinthe, leather, and vodka notes creates an aura of luxury and exclusivity. Perfect for the confident man who commands attention wherever the night takes him.
